spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) plus ({@dice 1d6}) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.
